/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the street, providing a driver's view of the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Power lines stretch across the sky, connecting the buildings that dot the landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall composition of the image paints a picture of a peaceful day in a bustling city.
